author: Trent Baker, Trent Baker
title: Surgeon General Issues Coronavirus Warning: 'This Week It's Going to Get Bad'
description: U.S. Surgeon General Dr. Jerome Adams issued Americans a stark warning on the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic during an appearance Monday on NBC's "Today." | Clips
content:
U.S. Surgeon General Dr. Jerome Adams issued Americans a stark warning on the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic during an appearance Monday on NBC’s “Today.”
Adams, in what he called a “somber occasion,” warned that it is “going to get bad” this week. He also called… [+1111 chars]
